node.name: details
node.text: Here you can select your hard disks and USB flash drives for configuration.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can make your display settings.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can make your Audio/Video settings.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can set your language.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can set your timezone.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can select from the following list.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can select the Transponder Mode. Please use a channel search after the Restart

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can make your general autostart settings.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can make your audio/video autostart settings.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can make your USB autostart settings.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can make your softcam/USB cardreader autostart settings.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can make your network autostart settings.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can make your child safety autostart settings.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can make your overclock settings.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can control the fan mode.

node.name: tvswitch
node.text: Switch TV to the correct input

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can make your HDMI-CEC settings.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can adjust the PiP functions.

node.name: nozapclear
node.text: Don't clear TV on zap (only with fastzap)

node.name: crosscontrol
node.text: Use cross control for fast zapping and vol

node.name: emucontrol
node.text: Deactivate Crypt Support on Media Playback

node.name: playerbufferseektime
node.text: Time to wait after seek for fill buffer

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can make advanced settings.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can make your module settings.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can make your timeshift settings.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can make your screensaver settings.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can define the paths for record, timeshift and movie player.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can make your EPG settings.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can define channels or favorites for EPG scan/refresh.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can assign channels to a specific CI-Module.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can edit the channel list.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can select a skin from the following list.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can make your mediadb settings.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can create, delete and edit timer events. Press ok to edit the selected timer. Press blue to check the timer log. Then choose red to delete a single entry or yellow to clear the list.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can edit timer events.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can search the EPG for specific genre or keyword.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can configure your CI-Modules.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can reset the smartcard reader(s).

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can backup and restore your configuration.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can make your PIN security settings.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can make your PIN security settings for menu access.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can view the current channel information.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can choose a tuner for configuration. For a channel search, the tuner(s) have to be configured before. Rotor equipment requires additional adjustments.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can configure your satellite tuner. First, select the satellite. When using DiSEqC, also define the used port. For advanced LNB/Unicable configuration, navigate to LNB/Unicable and press the red button.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can configure your cable tuner. Choose your cable provider and start an automatic search.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can configure your terrestrial tuner. Activate the terrestrial tuner and start an automatic search.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can set your hybrid tuner. Choose the required tuner mode.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can adjust your rotor equipment. Enter the latitude and longitude values by using the number keys.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can adjust the LNB/Unicable values for the selected tuner.

node.name: cleartransponder
node.text: Remove unused Transponder on used Satellites/Providers

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can set your channel search options. Very important, before channel scan, the tuner must be configured correctly.

node.name: cleartransponder
node.text: Remove unused Transponder on used Satellites/Providers

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can set your manual channel search options. Very important, before channel scan, the tuner must be configured correctly.

node.name: details
node.text: Press OK after scan has ended.

node.name: details
node.text: After the manual search, press the green button for saving the found channels. For adding a channel manually, select the channel in the right box and press the red button to save it. Press EXIT to discard all changes.

node.name: details
node.text: For getting Signal/SNR/BER values, zap to a channel of the satellite you are searching.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can check the signal quality of the current transponder.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can install plugins and extensions from our online offer.

node.name: details
node.text: Flash: Flash range is deleted after update, mnt: flash range to permanently update available, swap: USB medium permanently

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can start and manage your additional plugins.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can select your network interface.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can adjust the network interface.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can connect to your wireless network. 1. Use search button, select your SSID and press ok 2. Choose encryption type and enter key, accept with ok 3. Set automatic start if wanted and start with green.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can test your network.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can configure: Webinterface, Transcoding and RGUI

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can configure dynamic DNS services.

node.name: hdmi
node.node: <node posx="0" posy="360" name="t6" text="->swap<-" valign="middle" halign="center" width="100%" height="20">

node.name: details
node.text: A list of currently used network shares. You can add, edit, delete shares or search for new shares.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can add and configure your network shares.

node.name: details
node.text: If you don't find Windows shares, you need to disable 'Password protected sharing' in the 'Network and Sharing Center'.

node.name: details
node.text: Here you can configure your login credentials for accessing password protected shares.
